name: Endless Color Run
description:
It is an endless runner game for one player in 3D with a 3rd person camera where you have to stay in a colorful world. To do so, you have to avoid obstacles and run through and get the rainbows by switching your lane or jumping over it. Be careful, they increase your score but also your speed. Try to blow your best score!

#Global Game Jam 2022

Credits: 

Artist

Lyra Schwei - Clara Schweitzer - Modeling and 2D

WillScarletOhara - Jérémy Eneu - Texturing and Palm tree

Programmer EilTon - Dylan Delaunois

Music from : https://www.noiiz.com/sounds/free_packs/1598
